96 inline b2ChainShape::b2ChainShape()
97 {
98  m_type = e_chain;
99  m_radius = b2_polygonRadius;
100  m_vertices = NULL;
101  m_count = 0;
102  m_hasPrevVertex = false;
103  m_hasNextVertex = false;
104 }
